head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GOLDIN, DR. GURSTON

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GOLDIN, DR. GURSTON

block.p: GOLDIN-Dr. Gurston. The Riverdale Jewish Center mourns the loss of Dr. Gurston Goldin, beloved brother of our member Jessica Stern. We express profound condolences to his wife, brother, children, and the entire family. May they be comforted amongst the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Jonathan I. Rosenblatt, Rabbi Tobias B. Schapiro, President

GOLDIN-Dr. Gurston. The Riverdale Jewish Center mourns the loss of Dr. Gurston Goldin, beloved brother of our member Jessica Stern.
